#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{    int bags,loop,candies_per_bag,total_candies,time;

     cin>>loop;
    for(int i=0;i<loop;i++)
    {
     	cin>>bags;
      	int * array=new int[bags];

     	for(int i=0;i<bags;i++)
       	cin>>array[i];
     

    	total_candies=0;time=0;

     	for(int i=0;i<bags;i++)
        	 total_candies+=array[i];

     	candies_per_bag=total_candies/bags;
     
      	if(total_candies%bags==0)
        	  {   for(int i=0;i<bags;i++)
        	           time+=abs(array[i]-candies_per_bag);
        	      cout<<time<<endl;

        	   }
      	else
        	 cout<<-1<<endl;
     }
return 0;
}
